segments.text: Yes , I just wondered why the price between the ninth and tenth floor is so different .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! I see . Can you show me the location of Block I ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Please take a look at the model of the building . Nice Garden has a total of two blocks which are labeled Block I and Block II . Block I has a total of thirty-eighth floors . The thirty-seventh and thirty-eighth are penthouses . There are four units in one floor . The sizes of the units are one thousand square feet and one thousand and five hundred square feet . The size with one thousand square feet has three bedrooms and the biggest size has four bedrooms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are three elevators between one hundred and forty-eight units .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a total of one hundred and sixty parking spaces on the second and third floor , in which twelve are for visitors and the rest are for residents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , on the fourth floor is a recreation quarter . There are two swimming pools . One is Olympic standard size and the other one is for children . Also , there is a gymnasium for resident members only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The completion date will be July 1st 2007 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the price and the bank mortgage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please check up the price list . The average unit price is five million Hong Kong dollars . There are eight different banks that will provide a seventy percent mortgage loan . Also , the developer will offer another ten percent mortgage to purchasers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many payment methods are there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's all written on the brochure price list . I believe there will be one right for you . Please hurry up because almost half of units have already gone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I think I have to talk to the bank representatives . Thank you for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
